text: Very well connected and sheltered bus stop, that brings you to the neighboring spaces, malls, and train station. It's a no brainer orchard road bus stop, that's right in front of Tangs. If you're passing through this bus stop, there's nothing much to worry about, whether you need accessibility features or otherwise.
Beautiful and old but historical shopping mall. Have many luxury brands. Clean and spacious.

Bus stop nearest to Orchard MRT with plenty of direct buses to varieties of locations including Dhoby Ghaut Shenton Way Harbourfront Raffles Blvd Jurong East Bukit Merah Promenade Marina Bay and Suntec City. Convenient alternative to MRT. My favorite place to visit on the Christmas Eve.
